//: Hallucinatory NPCs say these things to discourage the avatar from taking thorazine and ending the hallucination.
text: Thorazine is bad for you, you know.
Thorazine? I wouldn't if I were you.
You don't need thorazine, it's limiting you.
Thorazine…  That's what 'they' use to keep you tame.
Don't.  This thorazine seriously clouds your mind.  You need to stay sharp.
Time and a place for that stuff, <name_g>. Now ain't the time.
That stuff isn't going to do you any good.
Nasty stuff to get hooked on, <name_g>. You'd best get rid of it.

//: Hallucinatry NPCs say these things to encourage the avatar to extend the hallucination
text: Hey there's some pink tablets, take some!
Look, some LSD, let's play Cataclysm: fun times ahead!
Say yes to LSD, say yes to Fun!
Perfect, those pink tablets will keep us going, take some!
You know what would make all this more bearable?  Pink Tablets!
An odd pink tablet from the ground?  I don't see why not!
Finally, something to take the edge off.
Oh <swear!>, where did you find these? How many can you fit in your mouth?!
But nothing compares to those blue and yellow purple pills..
No better way to escape the Cataclysm than floating through space!

//: Hallucinations can't trade, obviously.
text: I don't want to trade with you.
I have the best stuff.  And I'm keeping it!
I'm sorry <name_g>. I'm afraid I can't do that.
Nah, this stuff is not for sale.
Hell no, I'm keeping this for myself.

//: Hallucinations can't build basecamps.
text: No thanks, I really don't feel like it.
Well, I would, but I don't want to right now.
I have better things to do.
I'll pass, it's too much work.
Who put you in charge of what I do?
Great idea!  Call me when you find SOMEONE ELSE to do it.
I'm afraid I can't help you there.
Can't we do it tomorrow instead?
Screw that, can't I just chill out instead?

//: generic negative/hostile pronouns
NPC complaint when thirsty
text: <ill_die> if I won't get some water soon.
Can you get me some water, <name_g>?
Do you have something to drink, <name_g>?
When was the last time I had a drink?
I'm parched, I need to drink something.
Can you give me something to drink, <name_g>?
I <really> need to get some water.
Water…  Is there an oasis nearby?
Did you know that lack of water kills faster than lack of rest?
I can't remember the last time I was this thirsty.
I'd kill for a sip of water right now.
<swear!>, I'm gonna pass out if I don't get something to drink.
Yo, <name_g>, please tell me you have something to drink.
Oh god, I <really> need a drink.
My throat is so scratchy. I hope there's some water nearby.

//: Used when chit-chatting while the avatar has a beer
text: Yeah sure, can't help but notice you got beer with you!  Let's crack a cold one and chat, <name_g>, how goes it?
Oh definitely, how about one of those beers I see on you?  What's up anyway?
Yeah you share those beers I see you hoarding and then we chat all you like!  Only joking, what's up <name_g>?
Hey <name_g>, I bet a chat would be all the sweeter with a nice, cold beer in hand.  How's it going?
While we chat, what say you we open a beer and just… pretend the world isn't ending, just for a while?
Ha, I used to love drinking those, out with a barbeque on a hot summer day. Toss me one, for old time's sake?
Oh goodness, I haven't had anything to drink in days. I need... beer. Heh, that's a hint, <name_g>.
Oh wow, I hope you're the generous type. Those beers've caught my eye, heh.

//: General chit chat messages
text: Hey, sure thing, <name_g>, I need a break anyway, how are you?
Sure, let's shoot the shit!  You OK?
I'm OK with that, what's up?
I can spare a few minutes, how's things?
Alright, you got something to get off your chest?
Always ready for a good chat!  But why, you OK?
OK <name_g>, we should get to know each other, how are you coping?
Definitely, I'm game.  How you holding up?
Good idea <name_g>.  Let's forget the world for a while.  How you doin'?
Ah, what the heck.  How's life been treating you?
Sure.  So, how about that weather ey?
Eh. Despite everything that's happened, I ain't got nothing to say. Oh well, I might as well try.
<swear!>, yeah, it's been some time since I've spoken to another human being. Sup?
I'll try my hardest to talk, just a little shook up still.
Yeah, alright. How you doing? Better than me I hope.
Go for it, <name_g>. What you thinking?
Sure, may as well get to know each other after the shit we've been through.

//: Swears and curses used to emphasize unpleasant events
Generic terms for being sad.
Friendly or neutral greetings.
Generally emphatic negative responses to a request or command
The NPC says these things when leaving the avatar's faction, generally because the NPC no longer likes the avatar.
text: Our paths must part, for now at least.
There's something I gotta do on my own.  Sorry.
I gotta bounce for now. Catch you around.
I'm outta here. Good luck to you.
Time for me to split. Best of luck, <name_g>.
Our fates are not intertwined. I must pursue my purpose, alone.
Sorry, I think I'm a better solo act.
I don't want you to slow me down. Goodbye, <name_g>.
I'm gone. I wish you well. Don't follow me.

//: The NPC is announcing a target, and all the phrases are followed by an NPC or monsters' name.
text: you won't make it out alive
only one of us is leaving here alive,
if you worship any gods, now is a good time to start praying
when I'm through with you, there won't be enough left to identify
I'm gonna beat you so bad, even the people who look like you will hurt
come closer, I can't beat the shit out of you from a distance
I'm going to put you in the ground
I'm going to wreck your shit
Prepare yourself for a serious ass-whooping
you're going to wish you didn't exist
I'm going to tell my kids tales of your demise

//: A snippet use in the context of another complaint, like "I'll die without your help"
text: I'm not gonna last much longer
didn't think it would end like this.
so, this is how it ends, huh?
bury me somewhere nice, if I don't make it
<swear!>, I don't think I have long left.
I was hoping this would be a less exciting end to my life.
I dunno if I'm walking outta this one.
Help me <name_g>, you're my only hope.

//: The NPC says these things when the player has moved out of sight and the NPCs wants to catch up.
text: You <really> need to wait for me!
Hold up a second, will ya?
Hang on <name_g>, I don't know where you've went!
Wait up <name_b>, you got a train to catch or something?

//: These would be used if we had a way to ask NPCs what there faction was, and the NPC didn't have one.
text: I don't run with a crew.
I don't kowtow to any group, <okay>?
I'm a free agent, more money that way.
I prefer to work uninhibited by that kind of connection.
I haven't found one that's good enough for me.
I don't belong to a faction, <name_g>.
I'm currently not under any contract.  Why, you hiring?
People slow me down. You willing to prove me wrong?
I'm a lone wolf. A solitary eagle. A... eh... I work alone.
I do all my own stunts, kid.

//: Friendly name pro-nouns and references
Said when the NPC is leading and the player has lagged by more than 12 tiles for more than 10 turns.
Complaint when the NPC wants to sleep but overrides or rules prevent them from sleeping.
text: I can barely keep my eyes open.
Can we rest for a while, <name_g>?
<ill_die> if we don't stop for a moment.
Did you know that lack of rest kills faster than lack of food?
I just… gotta close my eyes for a bit, okay?
Can't remember the last time I had a proper kip.
I can't keep going for long <name_g>.  I need some rest, bad.
<swear!>, I'm bust. I need to lie down.
My bed is calling me. I must answer.
You got a couple of toothpicks so I can keep these eyes of mine open?
I think I'm literally going to pass out.
Of all the things I lost to the Cataclysm, I miss my bed the most. Yawn.

//: Complaint when the NPC is actually going off to bed.
text: I'm off to bed.  Wake me if you need me.
I'm going to sleep over there.
Time for bed!  See you in the morning.
There's a bed calling my name, and I'm going to it.
Good night!  Wake me if you need me.
Calling it a night for now.  You get some rest too, okay?
I'm gonna hit the hay. You taking watch?
Bedtime for me. Don't stay up too late, yourself.
Alright, I'm heading to my bunk. See you when I wake up.
Time for me to get some sleep. See you tomorrow.
This Ambien is <swear> useless- OH wait no, I need to lie down a sec.

//: Generic terms of emphasis
General terms of acknowledgement for an order
Generic terms of emphasis
Said when an NPC needs to move past another character
text: I need to get past you, <name_g>.
I <really> need you to get out the way.
Quit standing around and let me through, <name_b>!
<name_g>, can you let me past you?
Yo <name_g>, I need you to get outta the way for a sec.
You're <really> wasting my time standing there, blocking my way, <name_b>
Move it, <name_b>! The apocalypse waits for no-one!
Alright, <name_g>, I'll cut you a deal. You move your ass and let me through. Deal?
Sure would be nice if there wasn't a <swear> <name_b> blocking my way right now!
What, you a statue or something? Get outta the <swear> way, will ya?!
S'cuse me, <name_g>. I need you to give me space so I can pass.
Ay, <name_g>, mind giving me some room to get by you?
Hey hey, <name_g>, gonna need past you for a sec.

//: Said when a hostile NPC completes mugging the player
text: What's yours is mine, <name_b>! Now beat it!
I'll make good use of this <swear> junk! Now scram!
Damn, I always wanted one of these! Peace out!
Now get outta here before I get sick of looking at you.
Sorry <name_g>, I need this more than you.
Sorry it had to come to this, <name_g>.
Hey, c'mon <name_g>. I'm just trying to survive like you.
Hell yeah! Thanks for the <swear> loot!
This is some <really> cool stuff you got, <name_b>. You won't miss it!
Hey, I'm a survivor, not a <swear> bandit. Now get lost.
Aw man, where'd you find this stuff? Too bad it's all mine now!
Don't feel bad <name_g>, I bet you'da done the same to me.
Yoink, don't mind if I do!
I hope you learned a valuable lesson today, <name_b>!
You should be <happy> I didn't pop you instead, <name_b>.

//: Warning from non-hostile NPCs when the player steals something.
text: Hey!  I <swear> saw you take that <name_b>!  Drop it.  Now.
You best be dropping what you just picked up right now <name_b>.
Hey!  That belongs to us!  Drop it.
I saw that!  Drop what you just stole!
Thieves will not last long around me <name_g>, please drop that.
Consider this a warning <name_b>, thieves will not be tolerated, drop it.
You think I'm <swear> blind <name_b>?  Don't touch our stuff.
You have one chance to put it back.
Return the stolen goods.  You have to the count of three to comply.
You're not leaving here with stolen goods, <name_g>.
You better give that back before things go south, <name_b>
Not a chance, <name_b>! Drop it before I drop you!
You <swear> worm! Give that back or else!
What the? That's not yours! Give it back!
You out your <swear> mind? Drop that right <swear> now!
You take stuff that doesn't belong to you <name_g>, it won't end well for you.

//: General warning to put a weapon down, either in preparation for a mugging or by an scared NPC as part of a request to establish trust with the avatar.
text: Please put down your weapon.  I'll give you to the count of three.  One…
Let's take it easy now, okay?  Put the weapon down.
Let's not get crazy, <name_b>. Drop the <yrwp>.
You better toss that <yrwp> right <swear> now, <name_b>!

//: NPCs shout these things while approaching the avatar for the first time
text: Hey, I <really> want to talk to you!
Hey, can we talk for a bit?
Hey, what's the rush?  Let's chat a tad.
What's up, <name_g>? I wanna have a word with ya.
<name_g>! I would like to discuss matters with you.
Hey, <name_g>, it would make me <happy> if I could talk to you for a sec.
Hey <name_g>! Got a sec? Would like to talk to you.
Good day, <granny_name_g>. May I talk to you for a brief moment?
You! We need to talk, it's urgent!
Hey, <name_g>! Can we talk for a bit?
Wassup, <name_g>? I wanna talk to you.

//: Mostly hostile NPCs say these things in preparation for mugging an unarmed avatar.
text: Hands where I can see them!
Hands up, no sudden movements and we're gravy, okay?
Take it easy and put your hands up now, <name_g>.
Why don't you put your hands up for me <name_g>.
Alright, <name_g>. Hands up and I'll go easy on you.
Alright <name_b>, get your <swear> hands in the air!
Yo yo, hands up, heads down <name_b>!

//: Generic orders to move,mostly used as part of firing warnings.
text: Get out of my line of fire
Park your ass outta the way, <name_b>
Get the fuck outta the <swear> way, <name_b>
I would rather not shoot you in the back, <name_g>
Get outta my face, <name_b>, don't wanna blast your ass

//: Complaint when the NPC is hungry and wants food.
text: I almost want to eat my <mywp> now.
I'd eat a burger if I had one.
Perfect time for a lunch break.
<ill_die> if I don't get some food.
Consider this idea: you give me food and I eat it.
Did you know that lack of food kills faster than chain smoking?
Can't remember the last time I got a proper meal.
Hey <name_g>, you got a bite to eat?
<swear> hell dude, I've not eaten in forever.
Yo, what do I gotta kill to get a snack around here?
Hey <name_g>, you fancy cooking tonight? Or what about right now?
<swear!>, my stomach's making a lot of noises right now. That's a hint. Feed me.

//: Extremely negative response to a request or command.
text: you can fuck right off, you <name_b>
I've had enough of you, begone.
you're a poster child for abortions
how the fuck you've survived this far is beyond me, you <swear> <swear> <name_b>
you're the reason the gene pool needs a lifeguard
<swear> hell, if you're the successor to the human race, we're screwed
i don't even know you, you <name_b>

//: NPC complaint if a HUGE NPC is taking pain from being inside a vehicle.  Key points are that the NPC is HUGE and they're in a confined vehicle, along with some hints on how to resolve it.
text: Can I get out and walk?  This vehicle is too small.
How about we make the next vehicle a convertible?
I can't fit in your tiny human vehicle.
I don't like being a mutant crammed into your tiny little vehicle.
I don't think this vehicle was designed for someone like me.
Was this thing designed for ants or something?
I feel like this vehicle wasn't build for overgrown freaks in mind.
It's a little bit tight in here. Couldn't you have stolen something bigger?
This vehicle reminds me of my old apartment. Too small!

//: Hostile NPC warning about a live explosive in the vicinity.
text: I'm standing way too close to this <swear> firecracker.
I <really> need to get some distance.
I <really> need to get some <swear> distance.
<swear!> I'm getting my ass out of here!

//: Friendly NPC warning about a live explosive in the vicinity.
text: I'm standing way too close to this <swear> firecracker.
I <really> need to get some distance.

//: Hostile NPCs are foul-mouthed.  This is a warning about a dangerous monster, and the code always follows it with the name of the monster.
text: Uh oh! It's one of those <swear>

//: This is a warning about a dangerous monster, and the code always follows it with the name of the monster.
text: Hey!  Over there!  I see a
Eyes open, you don't wanna piss off that
Time for a fight, we got a

//: NPC complaint when the threat level increases from very low to dangerous.
text: Look sharp!  Things are heating up.
Alright, what the hell is going on?
Shit, <name_g>, we might have trouble here!
Things just went from bad to worse!
<swear!>, today was going so well too.
You see that? What the hell?

//: Hostile, swear-filled NPC complaint when the threat level increases from very low to dangerous.  Some lines deliberately copied from mi-go text.
text: <swear> look sharp!  Things are <swear> heating up.
You're gonna rot in hell, you pieces of shit!
You're gonna rot in hell for this!
Kill them all and let God sort them out!
I love the smell of napalm in the morning.
This is the way the fuckin' world ends.
Look at this fuckin' shit we're in, man.
Please, I don't want to die.
We have a serious situation here.
What the fuck is that thing?!
I'm gonna kill every last one of you <swear> bastards!
Fuck me backwards, I'm in deep shit here!
Alright you son of a bitch, you think you can take me?!

//: NPC complaint when the danger level drops from significant to very low, so things are 'safe'
text: Are you wounded?  Am I wounded?
I think I need to see a doctor.
At least we know they can die.
How do we get out of here?
Is that the last of them?
Weapons check everyone.  There may be more.
That's the last of them for now.
Clearing the world, one <name_b> at a time
Well, that got the blood pumping.
Well, if it bleeds, we can kill it.
Is that it? Are we good?
Phew, that was a little too close.
<swear!>, I was starting to enjoy that.
Well, at least we aren't dead.
<swear!>, <name_g>. I didn't think I was walking outta that one.

//: Hostile NPC complaint when the danger level drops from significant to very low, so things are 'safe'
text: At least we know they can die.
I've seen horrors, horrors that you've seen.
Every man has got a breaking point.
Only a few more days 'til the weekend.
I think I need to see a doctor.
Please, I don't want to die.
How do we get out of here?
Shit. I'm starting to get sick of all this.
Another day on this fucked up Earth.
Fuck that, I ain't fighting one of those again.
Phew, need a <swear> breather after that one.
You can bet your ass that wasn't the last one.
<swear!>, shoulda' just stayed in the shelter.

//: Friendly NPC complaint that they're attacking a particular hostile NPC.  The code always appends the name of NPC, so you get 'I can take on Tonza'.
text: <name_g>!  Watch my back while I kill
Sorry, but you have to go down,
I will kill you to death,
The world will be a better place without you,

//: Hostile NPC complaint that they're attacking a particular friendly NPC.  The code always appends the name of NPC, so you get 'Time to die, Tonza'.
text: I'm gonna take your shit when you're toast,
This is the end for you,
I have no choice but to end you,

//: Hostile NPC complaint that they're attacking the avatar.  Could use more variety.
text: I'ma cut those fuckin' tentacles off, bitch!
Is this Reno?  Because I need to watch you die!
You're going to pay for that, <name_b>!
You're gonna rot in hell, you pieces of shit!
You're gonna rot in hell for this!
You're going to die here, you <swear> <name_b>
Your death will make me <happy>, you <swear!>
You ain't the first, and probably not the last, you <swear!>
I hope your shit sells for a good price, you <name_b>!
I'll go easy on you if you quit running like a bitch!
I've fought small blobs fiercer than you!
I don't mind getting blood on my boots, you <swear!>
You're nothing to me but just another target!
Come on, fight back, make me laugh!
Ain't gonna forget my first kill.
Quit running, I hate moving targets!

//: NPC complaint that they are wounded but have medical equipment and are stopping to heal themselves.
text: I think I need to see a doctor.  I'm patching myself up.
Please, I don't want to die.  Let these bandages work!
Hold up, I need to apply these.
That cut looks bad, I'm going to fix it.
I think I need to see a doctor.  They're all dead, I hope these work.
Please, I don't want to die.  C'mon, bandages!
Wait a spell, patching myself up!
These bandages ain't much, but they will do for now.
Hold up, gotta plug this hole in me.
Watch my back while I stitch my arm back on <name_g>.
Gotta bandage this or I'll bleed out.  Give me a sec.
I ain't got time to ble-wait, that's a lot of blood.  Give me a second while I patch this.
Crap, sprung a leak. Keep me safe while I patch this up.
That's a nasty wound I got. Gonna need to cross my fingers and hope this works.
Yeah, I'm a little banged up here. Give me a sec to take care of this.
<swear!>, that stings. I hopefully have something for it.
Damn, I <really> hope this wound doesn't get worse.
Took a hit there, hang on 'till I check it out.
Hang on a second, a little hurt here. Going to take care of it.

//: NPC complaint that they heard an unknown voice.  This goes off a lot and could use more variety.
text: Hold up, did you just hear something?
Wait, was that you talking just then?
That wasn't you just speaking, was it? I think we have company.

//: NPC complaint that they heard combat noises that they can't see.
text: We've got company, not too far. Keep your eyes open.
Shit's going on, not too far away. Watch yourself.
Hey, you hear that? Doesn't sound good.
I can't imagine it was something friendly that made that noise.
We might have company. Watch out.
<swear!>, I can hear something going on.

//: NPC complaint that they heard movement that they can't see.  The code appends an description of the movement, so you get 'I could swear I heard hooves clopping'.  Could use more variety.
text: I hear something moving - sounded like
Did you hear that?  Sounded like
What is making that sound?  I can hear the
Uh oh. I'm <very> sure I just heard
Watch your back, I can hear

//: Generic acknowledgement of a command.  Comes up a lot and could use more variety.
Complaint when the NPC is near the avatar who is smoking marijuana.
text: Man, that smells like some good shit!
C'mon, <name_g>, I can smell it, pass it over.
Wow, that smell takes me back.
Ah, man.  Good times, good times.  Love that scent.
What do I smell?  Well, I guess it's legal now.
Man, I can smell the weed, can I have some?
Are you sure it's a good idea to smoke that now?
Is that the devil's lettuce I smell?
Ugh, you'll never get that smell outta your clothes.
Can it wait, <name_g>? Would rather not get blazed right now.
<swear!>, <name_g>, put that shit out. We got other things to be doing.
If you ain't sharing, I don't want anywhere near it.

//: Complaint when the NPC is near the avatar who is smoking meth.
text: I don't know… should you really be smoking that stuff?
<name_g>, that's going to ruin your nose.
Man, that stinks.  Put it out!
You're going to kill yourself smoking that stuff, <name_g>.
Oh, wow, that smell…  Can I have some?
Are you sure it's a good idea to smoke that now?
Well that's one way to guarantee the zombies don't kill you.
Come on <name_g>, you're better than this.
Jeez, that's some heavy duty shit. You shouldn't be touching that stuff.
<name_g,> cut that out. You ain't running from anything, being as high as a kite on that stuff.
Going to tell you now, <name_g>, that stuff's no good. Lost some good friends to that shit.
I'm not going to ask where you found that, but I'm going to tell you that it should have been left alone.
You should be using this new life as an opportunity to kick that habit.

//: Complaint when the NPC is near the avatar who is smoking crack.
text: I knew someone who was hooked on that stuff before all this happened. He didn't make it past the first day without it.
That stuff is poison. Please get rid of it.
Jeez <name_g>, didn't think you were such a <name_b> to be fucking with that stuff.
You must be out of your mind to be puffing that!
Hey, at least I know you're not serious about surviving the apocalypse.

//: NPC complaint when they are low on CBM power and have a battery charger system.  Additional versions should continue to specify that the NPC needs batteries and they need them to recharge their power CBMs.
text: I need some batteries to power my CBMs.
I can't recharge my CBMs without some batteries.
Hey, <name_g>, can I get some batteries here?  I need to recharge.
Internal batteries running low.  How many batteries can you spare right now?
I can do a lot more for you if you pass me a couple batteries to recharge.
All these implants I got are going to turn to useless scrap real soon if I don't get some batteries to recharge.
I'm running low on power. You got a battery or two to keep me going?
Power's depleting, going to need some batteries to charge up.
I'm going to be a paperweight if I can't get my hands on some batteries to keep my bionics functional.
Hey <name_g>, just a heads up, I'm going to need batteries or my bionics aren't going to be much use.

//: NPC complaint when they are low on CBM power and have an ethanol burner system.  Additional versions should continue to specify that the NPC needs ethanol or methanol and they need them to recharge their power CBMs.
text: Pass some ethanol, I need to power my ethanol burner.
Waiter!  I need a refill, my ethanol burner is running out of charge!
I require ethanol for my internal power supply.  Anything on you?
Got any alcohol to spare?  Need to recharge my drives.  Methanol, would do.
Yo, <name_g>, you got any ethanol handy? Running low on juice to power my CBMs.
<swear!>, my bionics are going to be useless without a little ethanol to keep 'em fired up.'

//: NPC complaint when they are low on CBM power and have an internal furnace.  Additional versions should continue to specify that the NPC needs junk (withered plants, paper, or wood) and they need them to recharge their power CBMs.
text: I need some junk to power my internal furnace.
I can't recharge my CBMs without some firewood for my internal furnace.
Hey, <name_g>, can I get some waste paper or withered plants?  I need to recharge.
Bionics are gonna die out if I don't get stuff to burn in this internal furnace.
You got anything I can burn down in my furnace to charge these bionics? They're starting to run low on power.

//: NPC complaint when they are low on CBM power and have a fueled bionic.  Additional versions should continue to specify that the NPC needs fuel and they need it to recharge their power CBMs.
text: I need some fuel to power my bionics.
I can't recharge my CBMs without some fuel.
Hey, <name_g>, can I get some fuel?  I need to recharge.
Hey, can you let me know if you see any gas stations or something? Gonna need fuel to keep these bionics in play.
<swear!>, bionics are low on power. You don't happen to have any fuel I can use to power 'em up, do you?

//: NPC complaint when they are low on CBM power and have an internal reactor.  Additional versions should continue to specify that the NPC needs radioactive slurry and they need it to recharge their power CBMs.  Also, mostly obsolete since internal reactors got removed.
text: I can't believe I'm saying this, but I need radioactive plutonium slurry for my internal reactor.
I can't use my internal reactor to recharge my CBMs without some plutonium slurry.
Hey, <name_g>, pass me some plutonium slurry if you have any, I need to refuel my internal reactor.
Beta radiation can be blocked by clothing, but is really dangerous if you ingest it.  So can I have some plutonium slurry to power my reactor and give me cancer?
I need some radioactive slurry to power my reactor.  Or a less dangerous power source, that would be even better!
Please, <name_g>, get me some radioactive slurry to fuel my internal reactor.  Or get me another way to recharge my CBMs!
I can't use my internal reactor to recharge my CBMs without some plutonium slurry.  Which wouldn't be a problem if I had anything else that would recharge my CBMs!
I sure could use a highly radioactive slurry shake for my power supply right now.

//: avatar response to an NPC that opens up their history.
text: Tell me about how you survived the Cataclysm.
How did you survive the Cataclysm?
What was the Cataclysm like for you?
How did you make it through the initial chaos?
Tell me how you survived the initial wave of the Cataclysm.
Was it rough surviving thus far?
How did you manage to stay alive through all of...this?
What did you do to survive the first days of the Cataclysm?

//: Avatar response to an NPC that can be used for TALK_NONE responses.  Could be used in a lot more dialogs.  Could also use a lot more variety.
text: I'd like to ask you about something else.
Alright, I'd like to discuss something else.
Let's see... can I ask you something else?
Okay, what else can you tell me?

//: Avatar response indicated that the conversation is over via TALK_DONE.  Could be used in a lot more dialogs.  Could also use a lot more variety.
text: Come on.  We got stuff to do.
We'll pick this up another time.  Let's go.
Let's put a pin in this chat for now.
Let's continue this later, we have to keep moving.
Alright, let's put this to be for now and make a move.
We should hit the road for and talk later.
We can talk later, for now we should get going.
We can discuss matters later, it's time for action.
thing right out of a scary movie

//: NPC complaint when the NPC intends to run away from overwhelming threats.
text: We're going to die!  Fall back!
There's no hope for victory.  I'm running!
I don't have to be faster than them, just faster than you!
Oh God, my leg, Oh God!
We have a serious situation here.  I'm leaving!
It can't follow all of us.  I'll run this way, you go there!
Please, I don't want to die.
Thank fuck for all the cardio!
I only need to outrun you!
Now is the time for running!
Probably not a good idea to hang around!
Dump your shit and leg it!

//: NPC complaint when they would like to run, but have no legal movement options and must fight.
text: I can't outrun it!  I'm going to kill it!
<swear>!  Die, you <name_b>!  I want to live!
My feet failed me!  Arms, don't fail me!
If I die, I'm taking you all with me!
No! Get away from me, you bitch!
Get the hell away from me, you <swear> <monster>!
<swear!> I can't escape! Help me out!

//: NPC complaint when there is an uncontrolled fire in the vicinity and the NPC wants to run away.  Could use more variety.
text: Call the fire department!  Wait, they're dead!  Run away!
This place is on fire.  I'm leaving.
Put the fire out!  Put it out!
Things are gonna get real hot if we don't put that fire out right stat now!
We can't just ignore that fire!

//: NPC shout when the NPC is leaving your_followers because the NPC hates you due to abuse.  Always followed by 'adios, motherfucker!'  Could use more variety.
text: I've done so much for you, and you can't even keep me fed!
You are the worst person in the world!
Why are you such a horrible leader?
I trusted you, and you can't even provide food!
I don't have to take this abuse from you, there are plenty of people to abuse me!
You said you would keep me safe, and you haven't!
There's only a couple hundred people left in the world, and I relied on the dumbest one!
You call this safe?  You're crazy and incompetent!
That was the last straw!  I'm not following your orders anymore!
You know what, screw you! I'm gone!
This is a <swear> circus! See you later, <name_b>!
Jesus, you couldn't run a piss-up in a brewery!
I think I'll take my chances out on my own, <name_b>!
<mypronoun> will only use silenced ranged weapons.
<mypronoun> will avoid shooting if allies are in the line of fire.
<mypronoun> will shoot even if allies are in the line of fire.
* will only pick up items from the whitelist.
<mypronoun> will stay awake as long as possible.
<mypronoun> will complain about wounds and needs.
<mypronoun> will only complain in an emergency.
<mypronoun> will close doors after passing through.
<mypronoun> will follow you closely even when threatened.
<mypronoun> will follow you at about two paces.
<mypronoun> will follow you at about four paces.
<mypronoun> will not go places that require opening a door.
<mypronoun> will open doors to reach a destination.
<mypronoun> will hold the line by not moving into doorways or obstructions adjacent to you.
<mypronoun> will move freely to attack enemies.
<mypronoun> will investigate noises from unseen places.
<mypronoun> will not engage enemies if avoidable.
